title: pool party zac splash art position
body: the splash art for pool party Zac on the character store page is currently positioned so that the skin is covered by the champion info and skin tabs

replies.body:
Hi! 

Thanks for the report! Would you be able to provide a screenshot of this? I'm not sure exactly where you're seeing this (old/new client?)

http://imgur.com/a/VKIJr
this is on the old client and am unsure if it shows up in the new.
